apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: ibm-vpc-block-csi-node
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ibm-vpc-block-csi-driver
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/scrape: 'true'
        prometheus.io/port: '9080'
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
      labels:
        app: ibm-vpc-block-csi-driver
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: ibm-vpc-block-node-sa
      containers:
      - name: csi-driver-registrar
        image: MUSTPATCHWITHKUSTOMIZE:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 0
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --kubelet-registration-path=$(DRIVER_REGISTRATION_SOCK)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: DRIVER_REGISTRATION_SOCK
          value: /var/lib/kubelet/csi-plugins/vpc.block.csi.ibm.io/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: plugin-dir
          mountPath: /csi
        - name: registration-dir
          mountPath: /registration
      - name: iks-vpc-block-node-driver
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 0
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        image: MUSTPATCHWITHKUSTOMIZE:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        args:
        - --v=5
        - --endpoint=unix:/csi/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: ibm-vpc-block-csi-configmap
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 250Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 50Mi
        ports:
        - name: healthz
          containerPort: 9808
          protocol: TCP
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          failureThreshold: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - name: kubelet-data-dir
          mountPath: /var/data/kubelet
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
        - name: plugin-dir
          mountPath: /csi
        - name: device-dir
          mountPath: /dev
        - name: etcudevpath
          mountPath: /etc/udev
        - name: runudevpath
          mountPath: /run/udev
        - name: libudevpath
          mountPath: /lib/udev
        - name: syspath
          mountPath: /sys
        - name: customer-auth
          readOnly: true
          mountPath: /etc/storage_ibmc
        - name: cluster-info
          readOnly: true
          mountPath: /etc/storage_ibmc/cluster_info
      - name: liveness-probe
        image: MUSTPATCHWITHKUSTOMIZE:stable
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 0
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 10Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: plugin-dir
          mountPath: /csi
      volumes:
      - name: registration-dir
        hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/
          type: Directory
      - name: kubelet-data-dir
        hostPath:
          path: /var/data/kubelet
          type: Directory
      - name: plugin-dir
        hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/csi-plugins/vpc.block.csi.ibm.io/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
      - name: device-dir
        hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
      - name: etcudevpath
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/udev
          type: Directory
      - name: runudevpath
        hostPath:
          path: /run/udev
          type: Directory
      - name: libudevpath
        hostPath:
          path: /lib/udev
          type: Directory
      - name: syspath
        hostPath:
          path: /sys
          type: Directory
      - name: customer-auth
        secret:
          secretName: storage-secret-store
      - name: cluster-info
        configMap:
          name: cluster-info

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: banias-frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: banias-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: banias-frontend
        k8s-app: banias-frontend
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: init-sysctl
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - 'sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses=1

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmnb=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmax=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.shmmax=68719476736

          sysctl -w kernel.shmall=4294967296

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w fs.file-max=100000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=0

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog=30000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_window_scaling=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_timestamp=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_sack=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=htcp

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time=60

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_time_wait=10

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established=300

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_generic_timeout=300

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets=2000000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=10

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl=15

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes=5

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      containers:
      - name: banias-frontend
        image: gcr.io/my-project/banias-frontend:test
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '3'
            memory: 12G
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: google-cloud-key
          mountPath: /var/secrets/google
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8081
        - name: prom-metrics
          containerPort: 8080
        env:
        - name: BANIAS_PROJECTID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PROJECTID
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_DEBUG
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_TOPIC
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_TOPIC
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
          value: /var/secrets/google/key.json
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      volumes:
      - name: google-cloud-key
        secret:
          secretName: pubsub-key

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: banias-frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: banias-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: banias-frontend
        k8s-app: banias-frontend
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: init-sysctl
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - 'sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses=1

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmnb=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmax=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.shmmax=68719476736

          sysctl -w kernel.shmall=4294967296

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w fs.file-max=100000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=0

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog=30000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_window_scaling=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_timestamp=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_sack=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=htcp

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time=60

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_time_wait=10

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established=300

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_generic_timeout=300

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets=2000000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=10

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl=15

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes=5

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          runAsNonRoot: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      containers:

        resources:
          limits:

        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
